import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import { Navbar, NavbarBrand, NavItem, NavLink } from 'reactstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export function NavBar(){ async function loginHandler(){ const top = window.outerHeight / 2 + window.screenY - 350 / 2; const left = window.outerWidth / 2 + window.screenX - 420 / 2; return window.open( "https://oauth.vk.com/authorize?client_id=51483485&redirect_uri=http://localhost:3000&scope=12&display=mobile&response_type=code", 'OAuth2 Popup', `height=${350},width=${420},top=${top},left=${left}` ); } return ( <>
    Магазин Продукты
    Корзина
) }
